identity.name: Vanguard MLM System
identity.description: A sophisticated MLM platform that balances corporate trust with the excitement of sales growth. Uses a 'Jewel & Luxury' aesthetic for high-ranking users and a clean, 'Swiss' layout for administrative tasks.

primary.description: Midnight Navy - Used for sidebars, primary buttons, and heavy headers. Convey authority.

secondary.description: Electric Blue - Used for active states, links, and primary actions in dark mode.

accent.description: Gold/Amber - Used exclusively for 'Success' metrics: Commissions, Ranks, Bonuses.

instructions_to_main_agent.project_setup: Initialize React + Vite + Tailwind. Use 'Shadcn/UI' for interactive components (Dialog, Dropdown, Select, Calendar, Tabs, Sonner).
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_logic: Implement a 'ThemeToggle' but default to Light Mode for Admin. Use Dark Mode for 'Ambassador' public profiles.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_logic: Create a layout wrapper 'DashboardLayout' with sidebar and topbar. Create 'AuthLayout' for login/register centered cards.
instructions_to_main_agent.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for general UI. Use 'react-icons/fa' (FontAwesome) for social or specific brand icons.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use 'Recharts' (via Shadcn Chart) for sales/commission graphs. Use AreaChart for revenue trends.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use 'framer-motion' for simple page transitions and list staggering. Don't over-animate the admin dashboard.

universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ðŸ”® etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
